thread.section_title: Hubert Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hubert | hubert.com
thread.title: Jackie

author: Jackie
title: Jackie
text:
When I placed my order, I was informed everything was instock, the order would be at the border in two days and at my door 3-5 business days.
And it was. The Customer Service Rep, that I spoke with, was very nice, friendly and helpful. Our Head Office mandates where we do our purchasing but that doesn't always ensure friendly service. It's nice to
deal with such pleasant Reps and it's not just this time, I have always had a very pleasant experience whenever I have placed an order.
Thank you!
